page.title: 13The Gala Queen
page.content: {Sharon Mallinson}is 12 years old and is{Gretna and Rigg Gala Queen 1985.} She moved to Gretna from Fauldhouse,West Lothian in 1978.She likes living in Gretna but thinks there should be more to do at night especially in the summer months.She likes the local Sunday Market and says it helps young people to earn some extra pocket money by helping run stalls.{Sharon}attends{Annan Academy} and enjoys travelling to school. Being the{Gala Queen}means a lot to{Sharon}as she has many duties to perform and can have a lot of fun at the same time.{Sharon's}main duties in{Gala Week}are attending the{ {competitions}and presenting the{ {trophies}and{prizes.}
